name: Tetris (itch) (MattDavies)
description:
For an assignment during my University degree, I had to create Tetris in Unreal Engine using only C++. 

Try to complete a row to smash that line and score some points, the more rows you complete at once, the more points you'll get!

 Each time you level up, the speed of the Tetriminos increases.

PC Controls:

Down arrow - Speed up

Left/Right arrow - Move left/right

Q/E - Rotate left/right

Escape - Pause

GamePad Controls:

D-Pad down - Speed Up

D-pad left/right - Move left/right

Left/Right bumper - Rotate left/right

Start - Pause
